Title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
Plot: Shang-Chi, the master of weaponry-based Kung Fu, is forced to confront his past after being drawn into the Ten Rings organization.
Writer: Dave Callaham, Destin Daniel Cretton, Andrew Lanham
Actors: Simu Liu, Awkwafina, Tony Chiu-Wai Leung

Title: No Time to Die
Plot: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter, an old friend from the CIA, turns up asking for help, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.
Writer: Neal Purvis, Robert Wade, Cary Joji Fukunaga
Actors: Daniel Craig, Ana de Armas, Rami Malek

Title: Avengers: Endgame
Plot: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.
Writer: Christopher Markus, Stephen McFeely, Stan Lee
Actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo

Title: Avengers: Infinity War
Plot: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.
Writer: Christopher Markus, Stephen McFeely, Stan Lee
Actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo

Title: Dune
Plot: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel, about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.
Writer: Jon Spaihts, Denis Villeneuve, Eric Roth

Title: Home Sweet Home Alone
Plot: A married couple tries to steal back a valuable heirloom from a troublesome kid.
Writer: Mikey Day, John Hughes, Streeter Seidell
Actors: Ellie Kemper, Rob Delaney, Archie Yates

Title: Captain America: Civil War
Plot: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.
Writer: Christopher Markus, Stephen McFeely, Joe Simon
Actors: Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr., Scarlett Johansson

Title: Finch
Plot: On a post-apocalyptic earth, a robot, built to protect the life of his creator's beloved dog, learns about life, love, friendship and what it means to be human.
Actors: Tom Hanks, Caleb Landry Jones, Lora Martinez-Cunningham

Title: Venom
Plot: A failed reporter is bonded to an alien entity, one of many symbiotes who have invaded Earth. But the being takes a liking to Earth and decides to protect it.
Writer: Jeff Pinkner, Scott Rosenberg, Kelly Marcel
Actors: Tom Hardy, Michelle Williams, Riz Ahmed

Title: Free Guy
Plot: A bank teller discovers that he's actually an NPC inside a brutal, open world video game.
Actors: Ryan Reynolds, Jodie Comer, Taika Waititi
